ComicInfo.Summary:
Ben Sharp and his friends build a new command center for their startup, replete with new coders and good intentions, but when their app goes viral and they achieve overnight success as the hottest technopreneurs in the Valley, theyâ€™ll find themselves swimming with sharks and facing the dangerous dilemma of just how unscrupulous they are willing to be for their vision.
